channel.title: Aerotest Operations Inc. (R-098)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: Forwards addl info re 881216 incident.Caused by designers of TRIGA Mark I.Licensee intends to add cleaning & lubricating rod actuating linkage & cleaning of housing above electrical portion of rod actuating switch to annual maint schedule.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: REED COLLEGE, PORTLAND, OR

item.title: Extends invitation to attend 871110 meeting w/Region V in San Francisco,CA to discuss policies & procedures for operator licensing activity in Region V & NRC policy & developments.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Informs of recent reorganization of NRR.T Michaels assigned as project manager for facility.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Forwards revised NRC Form 398.Rev reflects changes to 10CFR55 effective on 870526.Revised form requires new applications to complete each category including educ, training & experience.Changes detailed in Encl 2.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Provides NRC w/correct mailing address.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE, VENDOR/MANUFACTURER TO NRC
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Forwards corrected emergency plan for Aerotest radiography & research reactor,per NRC 870331 request.Check of files disclosed 840914 telcon memo which covered items omitted. Memo lost in sizeable file on emergency plans.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE, VENDOR/MANUFACTURER TO NRC
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Advises that 860915 rev to security plan consistent w/provisions of 10CFR50.54(p) & acceptable.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Forwards revised emergency plan.Plan identical to plan submitted & approved by NRC in 1984,save editorial changes to eliminate ambiguity.Updating covers increase in number of operating hours in Section I & employees in Section III.A.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE, VENDOR/MANUFACTURER TO NRC
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Responds to NRC 870123 ltr re violations noted in insp. Corrective actions:all scheduled tests,calibrs & maint requirements extracted & written into computerized calendar.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE, VENDOR/MANUFACTURER TO NRC
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Ack receipt of 870213 ltr informing NRC of steps taken to correct violations noted in insp.

item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Insp rept 50-228/99-201 on 990816-19.No violations noted. Major areas inspected:routine,announced insp was on-site review of selected aspects of licensee class II non-power reactor operation.

item.title: Responds to violations noted in insp of license R-98. Corrective actions:reviewed applicable portions of 10CFR & 49CFR re shipment of dangerous goods & registered cognizant personnel in seminars on shipment of radioactive matls.

item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Informs that two items re control room as emergency support ctr & alternate assembly area used only in case of fire not addressed in 870121 emergency plan,per 840914 telcon. Response requested within 60 days of ltr date.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Advises of change in telephone number.Telephone company will intercept calls dialed to old number & give correct number. Referral svc will be terminated within next few months.

item.title: Insp rept 50-228/98-201 on 981102-05.Violations noted.Major areas inspected:on-site review of selected aspects of licensees Class II non-power reactor operation including organization & staffing & review & audit functions.
